title: Best 'Carry the team' champions
body:
So, my boyfriend has been in this hardcore ranking mode and of course is in gold just like last season. The problem is that he gets so frustrated with some of his games and I feel for him. At least 85% of the time, he's got really dumb teammates, or the other teams has literally ONE champion capable of carrying their dumb team. 

So, my questions is what champs are more likely to be able to carry alone if their team is full of idiots, and why?
